title: Constant lag and i cant do anything- Low ping high fps still laggy
body:
The past month ive had an issue with lag and its not my side i have ping that is decent at about 40-50 and fps capped at 80 The game will still accept my input, but for that period of time all creeps/players on both teams will sort of glide in the direction they were going if they were moving, or freeze in place if they were standing still and i can see my health bar going down or an enemies. can i get some help please i have tried the in client repair and uninstalling/ reinstalling and have read every forum and trust me there are dozens of people with this problem this lasts from a second to 10 seconds and when it stops everything that happened abilities and etc happen at the same time.

 Here is a link to a recording of what i see when it happens - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tVfsV49aRy4
Note this happens every 30 seconds or so i cant play the game anymore because of it

Here are my Network Logs for a rioter to look at so they can see packet loss and help me fix it All of these logs are from 2017 these should be enough - the most recent game is a heavy lag game so that should show the most 
-snip-

replies.body: This looks like a connection problem and not fps.  Either a weak connection or packet loss is causing you to see some pretty big input delays, yet not enough to cut you off entirely.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)  on these matches so we can get an analysis of your issue.  Let me know what you find out!
not sure if you saw it but i posted a link to a file with network logs im confident its packet loss to the league servers because i dont have ping or lag issues in other games that are online based.

It's not a source that I clicked on, to be honest.  The [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) is simple enough that it doesn't require providing logs back.  You should instead hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attach the logs to us directly in the ticket instead of an external source.  I also edited out your link here in case your logs have any security sensitive information.  Our tech team will get back to you through your ticket as soon as possible!
